import Head from 'next/head' import Image from 'next/image' import Content from '../content/pages.js'; import Button from '../components/Button'; import CarouselSpecialties from '../components/CarouselSpecialties'; import toParagraph from '../utils/paragraphFormatter'; import remark from 'remark'; import remarkHtml from 'remark-html' import style from '../styles/Home.module.scss'; const HomeContent = Content.pages.home; const resultHTML = remark().use(remarkHtml); const Home = () => { const presentationText = HomeContent.presentationSection.text; return ( <>

{HomeContent.textSection.title}

{HomeContent.textSection.text}

{HomeContent.specialtiesSection.title}

{HomeContent.calculatorSection.title}

{HomeContent.presentationSection.title}

{resultHTML(presentationText)}
) } export default Home;
